participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, I enjoy spending time alone but also cherish the connections I have with close friends.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about life, I find joy in dancing and expressing myself through movement.
participant_2.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was 16. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. i was born in somalia.

content.text: Hello. My life is great now
do you have the summers off
